definition: marked by moderate steepness, stroke soothingly
details:
adjective
- marked by moderate steepness
= synonyms: easy
- having little impact
= synonyms: easy
- having or showing a kindly or tender nature
= example: having or showing a kindly or tender nature
- quiet and soothing
= example: quiet and soothing
- soft and mild
= synonyms: soft
- belonging to or characteristic of the nobility or aristocracy
= synonyms: blue
- easily handled or managed
= example: easily handled or managed
= synonyms: docile
verb
- stroke soothingly
- cause to be more favorably inclined
= synonyms: assuage, mollify, conciliate, appease, lenify, placate, gruntle, pacify
- give a title to someone
= synonyms: entitle, ennoble
